name: I, Enemy
description:
Made for the Community Game Jam! The Theme was : "The Game is a Liar"

Every comment appreciated. Please Rate the game.

Install instructions:

After downloading:

-Unzip the file

-Open the application file (IEnemy.exe)

-Enjoy the game!

Hit Esc to quit.

*Known issue : the Medicine bar goes off the screen if you are not playing at 2560x1080
